system.description: A sickly green chunky stream of bile comes out of the War Wizardâ€™s mouth in a 10ft line, dealing [[/roll 1D8]] damage on a successful attack. There is a [[/percent 50]] chance the target will lose their actions for the next [[/roll 1D4]] rounds while vomiting uncontrollably. Undead and mechanical creatures are unaffected by the chance of vomiting.
